body:
User reported CVEs for admin-tools image, specifically 
temporalio/admin-tools:1.28.0-tctl-1.18.2-cli-1.3.0

CVE-2025-22868 Critical
CVE-2025-22869 Critical
CVE-2025-22870 Critical
CVE-2025-22871 Medium
CVE-2025-22872 Medium

comments.body:
Thanks for reporting, do we know what binaries are affected by these? How did you curate this list?
Longer term, I hope we can deprecate this image and only package the minimal set of tools we need in our images.

title: CVE scan - admin-tools image
